Package chessai.chessai.swing_ui

Class Settings

java.lang.Object
chessai.chessai.swing_ui.Settings
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Settings extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the application settings (preferences). This class uses a singleton pattern.
See Also:
